text: Hi, I’m new here so this might be the incorrect manner to proceed.  I was looking through the link in preparation to try it out but noticed I already use /opt/R/x86_64. This is because the instructions <https://mac.r-project.org/tools/> optionally lead to the use of this directory. Older macs can’t run Catalina so they will still be using .bash_profile not .zprofile which might be worth a mention. Should Rstudio be mentioned as these instructions probably assume an Rstudio user? Also, Rswitch is not part of base R or CRAN so should that at least be highlighted?
